message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price just for you, Bob. I believe you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12000?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do better than $12000, but I need to make a profit. How about $14000?
I'm still not comfortable with $14000. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12500?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $13500?
I'm still not comfortable with $13500. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12800?
